analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x358d12436080a01a16f711014610f8a4c2c2d233.sol#134-151) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/1/0x358d12436080a01a16f711014610f8a4c2c2d233.sol#148-149)

PundiXToken.receiveBonus (/unique_chucks/1/0x358d12436080a01a16f711014610f8a4c2c2d233.sol#513-560) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(addr,bonusToken) (/unique_chucks/1/0x358d12436080a01a16f711014610f8a4c2c2d233.sol#560)

PundiXToken.recycleUnreceivedBonus (/unique_chucks/1/0x358d12436080a01a16f711014610f8a4c2c2d233.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(_address,bonusToken) (/unique_chucks/1/0x358d12436080a01a16f711014610f8a4c2c2d233.sol)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/1/0x358d12436080a01a16f711014610f8a4c2c2d233.sol#68-78) should be declared external
